This script subsets sagebrush plots from the greater AIM Database. 

## Load libraries

```{r paged.print=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
plot_data<-readRDS("output/2017/dove_creek/2017_dima_lpi_cover_all_dov") ## Change this to whatever file you want. 
plot_data
```

## Subset Sagebrush
```{r paged.print=TRUE}
sagebrush_plots<- plot_data %>%
  filter(str_detect(symbol,"^ART") | str_detect(symbol, "^ARN"))
sagebrush_plots
```

## Write to the File
```{r}
saveRDS(sagebrush_plots, "output/2017/dove_creek/2017_sagebrush_plots_lpi_cover_dov")
```
